sentences.en: A solicitation criminal is a special type of the co - felony classification in criminal law.
sentences.cn: 因此,在某种意义上,教唆犯是犯罪之病源.

sentences.en: A solicitation of votes or orders.

sentences.cn: 答: 以征集文件为主.

sentences.en: Clinton was criticized for his promiscuous solicitation of campaign money.
sentences.cn: 克林顿因为胡乱的筹措竞选经费而受到批评.

sentences.en: Design - Build projects are normally procured through a one - step Request for Proposal solicitation.
sentences.cn: 设计施工项目的获取通常通过投标申请这一步.

sentences.en: Developing cultivation and solicitation strategies will follow closely behind.
sentences.cn: 开发培育及劝募的策略将紧接于后.

sentences.en: Expressed as arbitrary and commitment, are a disguised form of solicitation or irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 因为随意的表白和承诺, 都是变相的索取或不负责任的表现.

sentences.en: He watched her walk from him with tender solicitation.
sentences.cn: 他温情脉脉地看着她离去,眼光中满含着乞求般的恋恋不舍.

sentences.en: His selfishness caused him to refuse my solicitation.
sentences.cn: 他的自私让他拒绝了我的请求.

sentences.en: I accepted the gifts at her solicitation.
sentences.cn: 在她的恳求之下,我接受了礼物.

sentences.en: Known for many years this beautiful place, with heavy solicitation enthusiasm we go.
sentences.cn: 这个享誉多年的秀美之地, 用沉甸甸的热情邀约我们前往.

sentences.en: Please email your English solicitation letter and resume before 15 January 2008 to us.
sentences.cn: 请将您的英文求职信和个人简历在2008年1月15日前发送到本公司.

sentences.en: Republican leaders are making open solicitation of the Italian-American vote.
sentences.cn: 共和党领袖正公开地向意大利裔美国人拉票。

sentences.en: Solicitation: To hand money to the poor after being asked.
sentences.cn: 第三阶恳求: 穷人请求后才给他们钱.

sentences.en: The design and solicitation of mascots are actually public campaign of the Olympic Games.
sentences.cn: 设计和宣传吉祥物的过程实际上就是宣传奥运会的过程.

sentences.en: This commentary in no a solicitation of business or investment advice.
sentences.cn: 本评论并非任何商业或投资劝诱.

trans.tran_cn: 诱惑，揽货，恳切地要求，游说
trans.tran_en: the act of asking someone for money, help, or information
